content.rendered:
Donor Recognition Programs

GEOKC Donor Recognition Programs are created for all selected prospects who really very helpful, determined and qualified to make a real history to recognized them forever. The GEOKC Donor Recognition wall includes two options for these prospects to recognize them forever. These options are known as Donor Recognition Programs, which are as follows:

  • Permanent Honor Opportunity
  • Permanent Naming Opportunity

Permanent Naming Opportunity include all names of prospects to recognize them in the name plates separately, and Permanent Honor Opportunity include all names of prospects to recognize them in a group.

Significant Memory:

Both the permanent naming and permanent honoring opportunities will be part of significant memories to support our capital campaign fundraising goal for new building construction of GEOKC.

To learn more about GEOKC Donors Recognition Wall and Donor Recognition Programs, please contact the GEOKC Campaigns Team (Team Three): 612-540-9651 or batheja.sunita@gmail.com
